May 13, 1905 D Cliviger Contest
Cliviger Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
cliviger-contest
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Bull's Head, Cliviger, Lancashire, England, UK Choice of test piece between "Gemma di Vergy" or "Rob Roy" March contest - 1st Burnley Temperance, 2nd Shaw. 1st prize £12, 2nd prize £8, 3rd prize £5, 4th prize £3, 5th prize £1. 8 bands entered, 6 competed. 7th annual contest
Feb. 5, 2012, 9:34 p.m. Sept. 5, 2018, 6:52 a.m.
1 Burnley Temperance John Gladney Jnr Rob Roy
2 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band William Rimmer Rob Roy
3 Barrow Steelworks Band A. McAlister Rob Roy
4 Nazebottom Temperance Christopher Smith Gemma di Vergy [arr. Smith]
5 Pendleton Public Alfred Gray Rob Roy
6 Burnley Artillery T. Greenwood Rob Roy
